verbs.description: halloween 1966 [V: revisited] i previously published this in daily kos it has been revised to reflect the times i woke that morning like any other school day with my dad yelling up the stairwell that if he had to come up those stairs to get me up one more time there would charlie tuna book lovers brett kavanaugh kos liberation league pittsburgh senate senator kos kos media gop dmca
